ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English unlauful, formed by prefixing un- (not) to lawful. Ultimately from Old English lagu (law).

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Not permitted by law; prohibited by statutes or regulations; illegal.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 违反法律的；非法的；不合法的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The security guards were accused of unlawful detention of the protesters.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这些保安被指控非法拘留抗议者。
